title: Mirch Masala
typeOfFood: Lacto, Indian, Buffet, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A family-run, Indian cuisine restaurant in a house-like setting, established 2014. Offers buffet at lunch and dinner with each day's main entrees changing daily. Ask and staff will point out the vegan dishes in the buffet. Previously 100% veg, but added chicken to menu, Aug 2015.
